series.name: Stranger Things
series.story_line: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

series.name: Wednesday
series.story_line: Wednesday Addams investigates a murder spree while navigating life at Nevermore Academy.

series.name: Bridgerton
series.story_line: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set in the backdrop of Regency-era England seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

series.name: Money Heist
series.story_line: A group of robbers assaults the Royal Mint of Spain under the guidance of their enigmatic leader, The Professor.

series.name: Breaking Bad
series.story_line: A chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

series.name: Dark
series.story_line: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two children exposes time travel secrets.

series.name: All of Us Are Dead
series.story_line: A high school becomes ground zero for a zombie virus outbreak, forcing trapped students to fight for survival.

series.name: Squid Game
series.story_line: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in deadly children's games for a life-changing prize.

series.name: The Walking Dead
series.story_line: Sheriff Rick Grimes leads a group of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

series.name: The Office
series.story_line: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

movies.name: Leo
movies.story_line: A mild-mannered café owner’s hidden past comes to light when he is drawn into a violent confrontation.

movies.name: Salaar
movies.story_line: A man embarks on a mission to fulfill a promise made to his dying friend, setting off a chain of violent events.

movies.name: HIT-3
movies.story_line: A detective faces a complex murder case that ties into his own haunting past.

movies.name: Dragon
movies.story_line: A young warrior sets out to tame a mythical dragon to save his kingdom from darkness.

movies.name: Adade Sundara
movies.story_line: Two lovers from different religious backgrounds navigate humor and chaos to win family approval.

movies.name: Good Bad Ugly
movies.story_line: Three men with contrasting morals cross paths in a high-stakes game of survival and revenge.

movies.name: Amaran
movies.story_line: A brave soldier’s valor and sacrifice define a nation’s pride during wartime.

movies.name: Meiyazhagan
movies.story_line: A heartfelt tale of friendship and integrity that changes lives in a small village.

movies.name: Saripodhaa Sanivaaram
movies.story_line: A vigilante unleashes chaos on corrupt officials every Saturday, following a deep personal tragedy.

romantic.name: La La Land
romantic.story_line: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

romantic.name: Tamasha
romantic.story_line: Ved and Tara meet in Corsica and decide to keep their real identities a secret, but destiny reunites them later.

romantic.name: The Notebook
romantic.story_line: A young couple fall in love in the 1940s but are torn apart by social differences and fate.

romantic.name: Love Today
romantic.story_line: A couple swaps their phones for a day and discover the truths hidden in their relationship.

romantic.name: Geetha Govindam
romantic.story_line: A young lecturer’s life turns upside down when a misunderstanding ruins his image with the girl he loves.

romantic.name: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
romantic.story_line: A high school girl’s secret love letters are exposed, turning her love life upside down.

romantic.name: Before Sunrise
romantic.story_line: Two strangers meet on a train and spend a romantic night exploring Vienna.
Two high school sweethearts reunite years later, rekindling feelings of nostalgia and love.

romantic.name: Crazy Rich Asians
romantic.story_line: A woman discovers her boyfriend belongs to one of Singapore’s richest families.

romantic.name: Me Before You
romantic.story_line: A young caregiver falls in love with a paralyzed man she is taking care of.

action.name: John Wick
action.story_line: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog.

action.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
action.story_line: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max helps a rebel warrior rescue women from a tyrant.

action.name: KGF: Chapter 2
action.story_line: Rocky becomes the kingpin of the Kolar Gold Fields and faces powerful enemies.

action.name: Extraction
action.story_line: A black-market mercenary embarks on a deadly mission to rescue a kidnapped child.

action.name: Vikram
action.story_line: A special agent leads a covert team to eliminate a deadly drug syndicate.

action.name: The Dark Knight
action.story_line: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wreaks havoc in Gotham.

action.name: Pushpa: The Rise
action.story_line: A laborer rises through the ranks of red sandalwood smuggling in South India.

action.name: Inception
action.story_line: A thief who steals secrets through dreams must plant an idea into a CEO’s mind.

action.name: Beast
action.story_line: A former RAW agent trapped in a mall must save hostages from terrorists.

action.name: RRR
action.story_line: Two revolutionaries unite to fight against British rule in pre-independent India.

drama.name: Forrest Gump
drama.story_line: A kind-hearted man’s journey through life and history with childlike innocence.

drama.name: The Shawshank Redemption
drama.story_line: A man wrongly imprisoned bonds with another inmate and finds hope behind bars.

drama.name: The Pursuit of Happyness
drama.story_line: A struggling salesman fights to create a better life for his son.

drama.name: Dangal
drama.story_line: A father trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers.

drama.name: Barfi!
drama.story_line: A deaf-mute man and an autistic girl share an unconventional bond.

drama.name: Taare Zameen Par
drama.story_line: A dyslexic child finds hope and guidance through an art teacher.

drama.name: Interstellar
drama.story_line: Explorers travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

drama.story_line: A mild-mannered café owner’s hidden past comes to light when he is drawn into a violent confrontation.

drama.story_line: A detective faces a complex murder case that ties into his own haunting past.

drama.name: Dragon
drama.story_line: A young warrior sets out to tame a mythical dragon to save his kingdom from darkness.

drama.name: Adade Sundara
drama.story_line: Two lovers from different religious backgrounds navigate humor and chaos to win family approval.

emotional.name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
emotional.story_line: A dog’s loyalty to his master transcends life and death.

emotional.name: Grave of the Fireflies
emotional.story_line: Two siblings struggle to survive in wartime Japan.

emotional.name: Marley & Me
emotional.story_line: A family learns life lessons from their mischievous golden retriever.

emotional.name: My Sister’s Keeper
emotional.story_line: A young girl sues her parents for medical emancipation.

emotional.story_line: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.
